ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Specialized Limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-tech specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Body Frames
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-tech frames that replace a persons skeletal structure and some of the surrounding tissue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Environmental Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-tech implants that assist in dealing with environmental hazards.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Combat Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-tech brain implants that assist the user in processing information in combat scenarios.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain wiring
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that induce, deduce, produce or prevent blunt sensations like joy or pain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural computation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that assist thought and learning by use of a direct, shallow brain-computer interface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialized limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.
